resources.string:
The goal of the opendays is to develop an android application for ISEP Open Days. 

Here are some of its features: 

1. When the visitor arrives at ISEP, he/she can flash a QR code to download the application 

2. The application provides a map of the building where the list of places to visit is indicated 

3. The application can warn the visitor that a conference is about to begin 

4. News or tweets of the day can be integrated into the application
